file_content.text: Hope you're not too close yet!
What's happening?
Nothing I can't handle, but we need to move the pickup!
We don't have time for this.
Just a quick detour through another tower. I'll be waiting!
Watch your back out there.
Be careful.
Yeah. Right. Make sure Lana's with you--and in one piece, okay?
I hope you know what you're doing.
This seems hastily planned.
If not, there will be consequences.
You'd better be, or else.
I want that evac ready, no excuses!
Damn right you will.
Listen to you, a real leader of troops.
Tell you what--if you're not there when we are, I get to shoot you.
Better be, or else....
If you're not, you better believe I'll come find you.
Better be, or you're dead.
Oh, you're a charmer.
You just make sure Lana gets out in one piece!
That's the plan. See you soon.
I intend to, Koth.
So it's you who's rescuing me all of a sudden.
Are you two...?
Is that your boyfriend, Lana?
I'll pretend that's not your greatest concern at this particular moment.
I'm not so sure I agree with your screening process, Lana.
I don't know about him....
Perhaps you miss your carbonite prison?
Don't forget--I also deemed you a worthy ally once.
Hmm. No.
We have to keep moving.
What?
It's... good to see you.
I have a million questions right now.
I know.
The answers will have to wait.
Well, if I land now, I'll be shot to pieces. So just think of it as a personal favor to me, huh? Duck through another tower and I'll find you.
My number-one passtime these days....
Love the enthusiasm!
Always love our little excursions, Lana. Back with you shortly.
So where did you recruit our getaway pilot?
How do you know Koth?
He's a native of Zakuul, believe it or not. Emperor Arcann wields great power now, but not all of his people support him blindly.
We believe they went this way, High Justice. Allow me to bypass the security door for you.
No need to trouble yourself....
After you.
